      Methods in facade with parameters of type Coupon 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void CompanyFacade.createCoupon(Coupon coupon)
      This function creates a coupon on the database, checking the coupon does not duplicate another coupon's name
      void CustomerFacade.purchaseCoupon(Coupon coupon)
      This function purchases a coupon from the database, checking the coupon is not out-dated, that there are more coupons in the database and that the customer did not already purchase that coupon:
      void CompanyFacade.removeCoupon(Coupon coupon)
      This function removes a coupon from the database- first from the Customer-Coupon joined table and from the Company-Coupon joined table, and at last from the coupon table.
      void CompanyFacade.updateCoupon(Coupon coupon)
      This function updates a coupon info in the database-
